sponsorName.label: What is the name of your sponsor?
sponsorName.required: Enter the name of your sponsor.
sponsorName.strlen: The name of your sponsor must be 500 characters or less.
sponsorName.change: Change the name of your sponsor

homeOfficeReference.label: What is your Home Office reference number?
homeOfficeReference.required: Enter your Home Office reference number.
homeOfficeReference.strlen: Your Home Office reference number must be 500 characters or less.
homeOfficeReference.change: Change your Home Office reference number

sponsorshipUndertakingSigned.legend: What date was your sponsorship undertaking signed?
sponsorshipUndertakingSigned.required: Enter the date that your sponsorship undertaking was signed.
sponsorshipUndertakingSigned.format: Enter a real date that your sponsorship undertaking was signed.
sponsorshipUndertakingSigned.change: Change the date your sponsorship undertaking was signed
